summary: A 20th Century pilot named Buck Rogers and his young friend Buddy Wade awake from 500 years in suspended animation to find that the world has been taken over by the outlaw army of Killer Kane.
cast: Buster Crabbe|Constance Moore|Jackie Moran|Jack Mulhall|Anthony Warde|Philson Ahn|C. Montague Shaw|Guy Usher|William Gould|Henry Brandon|Wheeler Oakman|Kenne Duncan|Carleton Young|Reed Howes|Wade Boteler|Al Bridge|Roy Butler|Eddy Chandler|Lane Chandler|Russ Clark|James Conaty|Cyril Delevanti|Frank Ellis|Jack Gardner|Karl Hackett|Kenneth Harlan|John Harmon|Ben Lewis|Theodore Lorch|Edmund Mortimer|Eddie Parker|Stanley Price|Francis Sayles|David Sharpe|Tom Steele|Phillip Trent
keywords: flying car|buck rogers character|character name as title|psychotronic film|suspended animation
director: Directors: Ford Beebe, Saul A. Goodkind
title: Buck Rogers
